timeline.message:
Extract Lit templates support to a separate module

Fixes #9038
Add lit template dependency to ITs.
Correct pom file and add template modules to bom
Correct pom file and add template modules to bom
AVoid cross module links in javadocs

timeline.bodyText: How can this work - polymer template is in a module that should not be visible
timeline.author: pleku
